getMobileOwnerDetails

Overview

This call is used to fetch the owner details of a specific property; it uses the BSGv2â€™s GetPropertyDetail under owner list node.

BSGv3 BSGv2 Show Additional Data Elements
No Yes

Additional Information

For further reading regarding BSG Elements:

  • Method_getPropertyDetail

Request

Parameters

Parameter Description Required
op Operation Yes
uid User ID Yes
sid Session ID Yes
id Property ID Yes

Sample Request { "op": "getMobileOwnerDetails", "uid": "TWISTUSER001", "sid": "2-4eed242594fc464787b8054ddc77de11", "id": "7003499" }

Response

Success: { "response": { "status": "success", "result": { "ownerName": "LIN MA", "ownerDetails": [ { "ownerName": "LIN MA", "ownerAddress": "56 MAXWELL ST SOUTH TURRAMURRA NSW 2074" }, { "ownerName": "XI ZHAO", "ownerAddress": "56 MAXWELL ST SOUTH TURRAMURRA NSW 2074" } ] } } }

Error: { "response": { "status": "error", "description": "error description" } }
